text: Rwose Allah yakiriye isezerano rya bene Isiraheli, maze tubatoranyamo abatware cumi na babiri. Nuko Allah aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri, njye ndi kumwe namwe, nimuramuka muhojejeho iswala, mugatanga amaturo, mukemera intumwa zanjye mukazishyigikira, mukanaguriza Allah inguzanyo nziza. Mu by’ukuri, nzabababarira ibyaha byanyu nzanabinjize mu busitani butembamo imigezi (Ijuru). Ariko muri mwe uzahakana nyuma y’ibyo, rwose azaba ayobye inzira igororotse.”
